meanings.sent1: The expensivenesses of designer clothes can make them unaffordable for many people.
meanings.sent2: I was surprised by the expensivenesses of the new car models.
meanings.sent3: The expensivenesses of the luxury vacation package made me rethink my travel plans.
meanings.sent4: Her taste in jewelry always reflects the expensivenesses of her choices.
meanings.sent5: The expensivenesses of maintaining a yacht can be overwhelming for some owners.

meanings.definition: The state of being costly or requiring a large amount of money.
meanings.sent1: The expensivenesses of medical treatments can put a strain on family finances.
meanings.sent2: She was not prepared for the expensivenesses of living in a big city.
meanings.sent3: The expensivenesses of dining at that fancy restaurant left us with empty wallets but full stomachs.
meanings.sent4: The expensivenesses of pursuing a career in acting can be daunting for aspiring performers.
meanings.sent5: The expensivenesses of maintaining a vintage car collection can be a passion for some enthusiasts.

meanings.definition: The condition of having a high price or value.
meanings.sent1: The expensivenesses of the rare painting made it a prized possession for the art collector.
meanings.sent2: He was willing to pay the expensivenesses of the antique watch to add it to his collection.
meanings.sent3: The expensivenesses of the limited edition sneakers made them a coveted item among sneakerheads.
meanings.sent4: The expensivenesses of the real estate in that neighborhood made it exclusive to wealthy buyers.
meanings.sent5: The expensivenesses of the designer handbag was evident in its exquisite craftsmanship.
